data.message:
Im Falling...
and its coming from the inside...
im still young...
but i feel like an old man...
what the fuck is up with that...
i dont know...
what the fuck...

shifting up and down...
i'm wasted...
so I smoke...
i'm wreckless...
take a guess...
its useless... 
i'm a mess...
its time for me to go...
i'm going overboard...
i'm falling...
and GoD...
can't hear my Call...
its time for me to go...

its strange...
that you can walk...
 thru the fire...
it aint greener...
but i bet the weed is better...
you know...
smoke it till i drop...
and thats how it goes...
